I was confused for a second because it said DRUMPF on my screen, but then I remember I have an extension on chrome that changes trump into drumpf (his original family name)
Oh my god, another John Oliver fan! :D
YAAAAAAS!!!! I love him so much lol :D

Good to meet you! :D
British humor in general is pretty great. ^.^

I never understood this whole thing about Drumpf. Chances are, if you're ancestors went through Ellis island, your last name isn't you original last name. If you're of African American descent, it was very often that slaves changed surnames throughout their lives. It is a lot more common than people seem to realize.
Well the thing about it is, that its a way to seperate him from trump (the brand)
